0.9.13.en: Added flows to enable/disable metrics and set write interval.

0.9.11.en: Added triggers for online and offline events. Added export of CPU usage per app. Name for measurements can be prefixed. Added tag_2 for export of CPU usage.

0.9.10.en: Added triggers for online and offline events. Added export of CPU usage per app. Name for measurements can be prefixed.

0.9.9.en: Handle adding several devices at the same time.

0.9.8.en: Handle adding several devices at the same time.

0.9.7.en: Name standard for measurements can be changed. Zone id and name as tags.

0.9.6.en: Support for InfluxDB v2 and InfluxDb Cloud.

0.9.2.en: Added logging of Homey metrics.  Added protocol, username and password to settings.
